column4: so i guess the root of the problem is, how can i fix this: pulseaudio[#]: lock-autospawn.c: Cannot access autospawn lock.
im about to run out of disk space again >.< is it safe to clear : /var/log/syslog, /var/log/messages, and /var/log/user.log
are those files really that big or do you just have a small disk
